name: everything you touch
description:
you are man trying to suvive a bug infestation however everything you touch turns in to more bugs and you bullets turn also turn it in to bugs. 

Game info 

-shoot on mouse 1

-move with wasd.

- 20 HP for the player

-Bugs have 5 Hp

-Walls regen after 5 secs.

-You can't win. you just keep playing intil you die.
